articles.title: Mary Pat Gleason obituary: “Mom” actress dies at 70 - Legacy.com
articles.description: Mary Pat Gleason, actress who wrote for and starred in “Guiding Light” and had a recurring role in “Mom,” died Tuesday of cancer at the age of 70.
articles.content:
Mary Pat Gleason was an actress known for roles including Jane Horgan on The Guiding Light and Mary on Mom.
